~
please stop calling me gay

with women with big breasts
'cause
penises are for faggots

because that would make me gay
i love sex with vaginas
i love sex with pussies
i touched a willy in high school once and it was just a litte mistake
so please stop calling me gay
please stop calling me gay
Yeah, please stop calling me gay
~
Thoughts?

     i really don't like to evaluate lyrics only without the music. it's just not fair to anyone

10.27.17  10:12 am   How do you move on from something bad that has happened?

     make more things happen!

10.27.17  10:11 am   the last time id checked your aquestions page was back in 2016 and so i was pretty damn bewildered by all these questions about whether you have depression cAUse i couldve sworn i saw you write(imply) that you were depressed
anyway i scrolled through all your answers to see why id thought that and 4.26.16  3:28 pm, 4.4.16 1:30 am but i realise now that you werent referring to depression the mental illness

     i wasn't referring to depression at all. both the questions you just listed had multiple options

     and perhaps all that was why some people thought you were depressed¿

     you really think people read back that far? i get asked every day if i'm depressed or sad, and i think it's just a very popular topic these days. to be fair, there are many other questions i get asked every day too, i get a lot of questions

      anyway i wonder how annoyed you are at all the questions about your mental state

     the only type of question that's actually annoying is when people ask 'how annoyed i am' about something. it's almost as if they are encouraging me to be annoyed

     and also my question is have you ever regretted something youve said before?

     yes

10.27.17  10:08 am   I watched "movie star" again and I swear I caught stuff I hadn't noticed before. Do you like to make videos like that where there's something new on each viewing?

     i can't control what people see which time, but it is nice to have enough to get people through the winter

10.27.17  9:59 am   how does one get a perfect score in ap geography?

     i think you'd have to know all the right answers

10.27.17  9:34 am   What should I say when people ask me what type of music I like?

     perhaps you could just teleport to another dimension

     I know they're trying to be nice and want to start up a conversation about music, so I don't want to be rude and end the conversation by saying 'a little of everything' or something like that. And I also don't want to shut down their question by saying that I don't like breaking down music in set 'types'. Even worse is when people ask me to name specific bands/artists I like, and I don't know how to chose just a few to name.  Im guessing you get asked this type of stuff a lot on here. What's a good friendly way to answer these types of questions?

     i'm still searching for a good way

10.27.17  8:22 am   why are you like this

     like what, and why are you like the way you are

10.27.17  2:57 am   How to cure tone deafness??

     i don't know

10.27.17  2:00 am   to clarify: i'm not tonedeaf, i can identify some easy stuff like maj7 chords, but if i had to transcribe a melody i would be totally lost unless i had a keyboard and lots of time to replay it. so is there a way i can actively try to fix that or no

     just keep familiarizing yourself with what's going on in all the songs you know. and then do some songs you don't know

10.27.17  1:09 am   what would you think would be a zen chord? or a zen chord progression?

     i'd say wait until i hear something before i worry about calling it zen or not. it doesn't seem responsible to go out searching for chords to be called a certain thing. call me crazy, but i think the sound of a chord is more important than the name

10.27.17  12:52 am   Why do the scientists still have so much to figure out?

     it's kind of like if you look at a runner in the middle of the race. why have they not finished the race yet?

10.27.17  12:52 am   is it ok if i make a living off my music and dont go to college

     oh now that's what i call using your thinking cap

10.27.17  12:44 am   You've mentioned multiple times that the key to just getting work done and not caring about insecurities is to just let it be there until you're ready to explode. Since I've actually started feeling like im about to explode, I've taken to calling this the Wurtz effect. Since I doubt you'd like it to be called like that (Even by one person), what should I call this feeling according to you?

     ah, to find out what i would call it, simply re-read the question when i described it! or even easier, re-read your own question in which you quoted the way i described it!
